translation.en: I'm calm, steady.
I slept well. 8.2 hours. No bad dreams.
translation.it: Ho dormito bene. 8,2 ore. Nessun brutto sogno.

translation.en: I am ready to go.
Ready to do my job to the best of my abilities.
translation.it: Pronto a fare il mio lavoro al meglio delle mie capacità.

translation.en: I am focused only on the essential, to the exclusion of all else.
translation.it: Sono concentrato sull'essenziale, tralasciando tutto il resto.

translation.en: I will make only pragmatic decisions.
I will not allow myself to be distracted.
I will not allow my mind to linger on that which is unimportant.
translation.it: Non mi farò deconcentrare dalle cose poco importanti.

translation.en: I will not rely on anyone or anything.
translation.it: Non farò affidamento su niente o nessuno.

translation.en: I will not be vulnerable to mistakes.
Resting BPM, 47. Submit.
[automated voice] Your psychological evaluation has been approved.
translation.it: La sua valutazione psicologica è stata approvata.

translation.en: As a reminder,
translation.it: Le ricordiamo di effettuare i controlli di sicurezza e tecnici...

translation.en: please perform any safety and equipment checks...
translation.it: Le ricordiamo di effettuare i controlli di sicurezza e tecnici... Ho sempre voluto diventare un astronauta,

translation.en: [Roy] I always wanted to become an astronaut...
translation.it: Ho sempre voluto diventare un astronauta,

translation.en: for the future of mankind and all.
translation.it: per il futuro dell'umanità e non solo.

translation.en: At least, that's what I always told myself.
translation.it: Perlomeno è quello che mi sono sempre raccontato.

translation.en: I see myself from the outside.
Smile, present a side.
translation.it: Sorrido, mostro un lato di me.

translation.en: It's a performance...
with my eye on the exit.
Always on the exit.
Just don't touch me.
[man 1 on radio] Take care, Major. Be careful.
[Roy] Thanks for that.
[man 2 on radio] Roy, Bravo post has got a robotic arm on 93 Echo...
translation.it: Roy, il traliccio B rileva braccio robotico su 93 E

translation.en: appears to be malfunctioning.
We're gonna need you to take a team down there and check it out.
translation.it: Dovrai andare con una squadra a controllarlo.

translation.en: Run some diagnostics. Over.
[Roy] Copy that. Heading that way.
[Doug on radio] Good morning to our astronauts up there on the International Space Antenna.
translation.it: Buongiorno agli astronauti sull'Antenna Spaziale Internazionale.

translation.en: Sure is a beautiful day.
Just perfect to try and contact...
our distant neighbors out there in the heavens.
translation.it: i nostri lontani vicini là fuori nella volta celeste.

translation.en: [Roy] At least it's comfortable out here.
[Doug] I got some scores here.
Let's see, it was Iowa State over Kansas, 35 - 16.
translation.it: Vediamo, Iowa State batte Kansas, 35 a 16.

translation.en: [Roy] Space I understand.
Control, I have visual on the arm. Over.
[Officer 1] Affirmative, Major. Proceed.
[Roy] Copy that. Moving to the unit now.
Control, I'm seeing a power surge on C-post. You getting that?
translation.it: Controllo, vedo una sovratensione sul traliccio C. Vi risulta?

translation.en: [Officer 2] Uh... Roger that, Roy...
translation.it: Ricevuto, Roy... Controllo, c'è molta gente, lassù. Passo.

translation.en: [Roy] Control, we got a lot of people up there. Over. [astronaut] Control. Control, I think we have some spikes...
translation.it: Controllo. Controllo, ci sono degli sbalzi di tensione...

translation.en: [Officer 2] Please just stand by, we're working the issue.
translation.it: Restate in attesa, stiamo controllando. - Restate in attesa. - Controllo, si verificano dappertutto.

translation.en: Just stand by. [astronaut] Control, they're happening everywhere.
translation.it: - Restate in attesa. - Controllo, si verificano dappertutto.

translation.en: [Roy] Command, cutting power.
[Officer 2] Get off the tower now!
You've gotta bail out!
[astronaut] Oh, my God!
[Roy] Control, McBride.
I'm in a spin. Atmosphere's too thin to stabilize.
translation.it: Sto roteando su me stesso. L'atmosfera è troppo sottile per stabilizzarmi.

translation.en: I'm trying to keep the tumble down, so I don't black out.
translation.it: Cerco di rallentare la caduta per non perdere i sensi.

translation.en: Control, do you read?
[Roy] "A self-destructive side."
That's what she used to say to me.
I should feel something.
I survived. I should feel something.
[reporter] In what has become known as "The Surge"...
a series of destructive electrical storms has wreaked havoc across the globe...
translation.it: delle tempeste elettriche devastanti che scatenano il caos in tutto il mondo.

translation.en: and scientists are concerned we've not seen the last of them yet.
translation.it: Gli scienziati temono che colpiranno ancora.

translation.en: Their origin? Outer space.
-The cause? Unknown so far... -[beeps]
[Commander] This is a message from SPACECOM.
translation.it: Questo è un messaggio dallo SPACECOM.

translation.en: In light of the recent catastrophe...
your attendance is required for a debrief...
to be held in Building 91, Vandersteen Base.
Please note, this meeting will be classified "top secret."
translation.it: Ricordi che sarà una riunione top secret.

translation.en: Roy, how are you? Thanks for coming in. Appreciate it.
translation.it: Roy, come sta? Grazie di essere qui. Lo apprezzo molto.

translation.en: [Roy] General. This is Lieutenant General Rivas, Director of
translation.it: - Generale. - Le presento il tenente generale Rivas...

translation.en: -U.S. SPACECOM Special Ops. -Hi.
-Sir. -[Rivas] Major.
[Stroud] Adjutant General Vogel, head of Security.
translation.it: L'aiutante generale Vogel, capo della Sicurezza.

translation.en: -Major. -Ma'am.
[Stroud] They flew all the way in from Virginia just last night, just to see you.
translation.it: Sono atterrati ieri sera dalla Virginia solo per vederla.

translation.en: Well, thank you.
Your, uh, profile is certainly very impressive.
translation.it: Il suo profilo è di certo sbalorditivo.

translation.en: You've done exceptionally well on all the assessment tests.
translation.it: Punteggi altissimi nei test di valutazione.

translation.en: Basic combat, space training. Just exceptional across the board.
translation.it: Combattimento, addestramento spaziale. Eccezionale in tutto.

translation.en: The rumor is that your pulse rate has never gone above 80...
translation.it: Si dice che il suo battito non superi mai 80,

translation.en: in any of the spacewalks, skywalks, and even on this most recent fall.
translation.it: durante passeggiate spaziali, aeree o durante cadute come l'ultima.

translation.en: Is that correct?
Well, so far, sir.
[Stroud] That's very impressive.
According to this, married once, no children?
translation.it: Qui dice che era sposato senza figli.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
It's dangerous business, as we know. Best not to subject others to it.
translation.it: È un lavoro pericoloso, lo sappiamo. Meglio non coinvolgere altre persone.

translation.en: Fair enough.
Well, we didn't bring you in here to talk about your fall, Roy.
translation.it: Beh, non l'abbiamo convocata qui per parlare della sua caduta, Roy.

translation.en: We have something...
of a highly classified nature to show you.
Please have a seat, Major.
Yes, ma'am.
[Rivas] What you are about to see are spectrogram images of Neptune.
translation.it: Sta per vedere degli spettrogrammi di Nettuno.

translation.en: These are cosmic ray bursts.
translation.it: Quelle sono esplosioni di raggi cosmici.

translation.en: That was taken just 11 days ago.
translation.it: L'immagine è di appena 11 giorni fa.

translation.en: It released high-energy particles...
translation.it: Hanno rilasciato particelle ad alta energia

translation.en: that caused a catastrophic power surge all over the world.
translation.it: causando un catastrofico picco in tutto il mondo.

translation.en: And that's what almost killed you.
translation.it: Ciò che per poco non la uccideva.

translation.en: The rays grow stronger as they radiate towards us here on Earth.
translation.it: I raggi aumentano di intensità mentre si propagano verso la Terra.

translation.en: Major, what can you tell us about the Lima Project?
translation.it: Maggiore, cosa sa dirci del Progetto Lima?

translation.en: First manned expedition to the outer solar system, sir.
translation.it: La prima spedizione umana verso il sistema solare esterno, signore.

translation.en: Some 29 years ago, as you know.
[Rivas] And the commander was...
He was my father, sir.
The ship disappeared approximately 16 years into the mission.
translation.it: La nave svanì circa 16 anni dopo l'inizio della missione.

translation.en: No data was ever recovered. Deep space missions were halted after that.
translation.it: Dati mai recuperati. Bloccate le missioni verso lo spazio profondo subito dopo.

translation.en: Yes, that's him.
Can you tell us how you handled your father's absence?
translation.it: Può dirci come ha gestito l'assenza di suo padre?

translation.en: Well...
My mother was certainly distressed by it. Uh, she was quite ill at the time.
translation.it: Mia madre entrò in crisi. Stette molto male, all'epoca.

translation.en: But he was, uh, committed to his job...
translation.it: Ma lui credeva nel suo lavoro

translation.en: and I'm sure it was very difficult for him as well.
translation.it: e di certo fu molto dura anche per lui.

translation.en: [Stroud] Roy...
we have something that might come as quite a shock to you.
translation.it: abbiamo qualcosa che potrebbe causarle un vero shock.

translation.en: We believe your father is still alive near Neptune.
translation.it: Crediamo che suo padre sia ancora vivo vicino al pianeta Nettuno.

translation.en: Where exactly, we do not know.
Now, we've sent out numerous drones, but obviously, it's a vast area to cover.
translation.it: Abbiamo inviato svariati droni, ma l'area è molto vasta.

translation.en: My father's alive, sir?
We believe so.
[Stroud] Roy, The Surge seems to be the result of some kind of anti-matter reaction.
translation.it: Roy, il picco pare sia provocato da una sorta di reazione all'antimateria.

translation.en: Now, the Lima Project was powered by that material...
translation.it: Il Progetto Lima era alimentato da quel materiale

translation.en: and your father was in charge of it.
translation.it: e suo padre ne era responsabile.

translation.en: Now, we're talking about a potentially unstoppable chain reaction here.
translation.it: Stiamo parlando di una reazione a catena potenzialmente incontrollabile.

translation.en: The uncontrolled release of anti-matter...
could ultimately threaten the stability of our entire solar system.
translation.it: potrebbe minacciare la stabilità dell'intero sistema solare.

translation.en: All life could be destroyed.
translation.it: E distruggere ogni forma di vita.

translation.en: Major, we would like you to send a personal message on Mars by secure laser...
translation.it: Dovrebbe inviare un messaggio personale su Marte tramite un cripto-laser

translation.en: to what we hope is the Lima Project.
translation.it: a ciò che speriamo essere il Progetto Lima.

translation.en: The text of your message would be prepared in advance, of course.
translation.it: Il testo del messaggio sarà ovviamente preparato in anticipo.

translation.en: Mars, sir? I'm going to Mars?
It is the last secure hub we have.
translation.it: È l'ultima base sicura che abbiamo.

translation.en: [Stroud] Roy, we need to find out just what we're up against here.
translation.it: Roy, dobbiamo scoprire con cosa abbiamo a che fare.

translation.en: Our underground Mars base was the only one unaffected by The Surge.
translation.it: La base sotterranea su Marte è l'unica a non essere stata toccata dal picco.

translation.en: And we believe a personal plea, from you to your father, might elicit a response.
translation.it: Un appello personale a suo padre potrebbe indurlo a rispondere.

translation.en: We can track that signal...
locate him and figure out a way to stop this.
translation.it: localizzeremo suo padre e capiremo come fermare questa cosa.

translation.en: What is happening out there is a crisis of unknown magnitude.
translation.it: Là fuori si sta verificando una crisi di ampiezza ignota.

translation.en: Now, we're counting on you to help us find him.
translation.it: Noi contiamo su di lei per aiutarci a trovarlo.

translation.en: Are you with us?
-Yes, I am, sir. -[Stroud] Good.
You deploy first to the moon.
Our long-range rockets are stationed there on the Far Side.
translation.it: I nostri razzi a lungo raggio si trovano sulla faccia nascosta.

translation.en: Everything after that will be on a need-to-know basis.
translation.it: Dopo, riceverà i dettagli necessari al bisogno.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Given the magnitude of the threat...
a cover story is being formulated to avoid all panic.
translation.it: stiamo lavorando a una copertura per evitare il panico.

translation.en: You'll be traveling commercially to the moon to keep a low profile.
translation.it: Userà mezzi di trasporto commerciali per non dare nell'occhio.

translation.en: Colonel Pruitt will be your point person from here on.
translation.it: D'ora in poi, risponderà al colonnello Pruitt.

translation.en: Absolute top secrecy must be maintained.
translation.it: Dovrà mantenere il massimo livello di segretezza.

translation.en: [Roy] "Are you with us?"
Like I have a choice.
My dad was a pioneer.
He sacrificed himself for the search for intelligent life.
translation.it: Si sacrificò per la ricerca di vita intelligente.

translation.en: My dad was the program.
I was 16 when he left, 29 when he disappeared.
translation.it: Avevo 16 anni quando partì, 29 quando scomparve.

translation.en: [automated voice] Archived message, received 27 years...
-3 months, 2 days ago. -[Roy] And that's that.
translation.it: - tre mesi e due giorni fa. - E questo è quanto.

translation.en: [Clifford] Roy, this is a message from your father.
translation.it: Roy, questo è un messaggio di tuo padre.

translation.en: I'm coming at you from the Lima Project.
Just on our way past Jupiter and ultimately on to Neptune.
translation.it: Abbiamo oltrepassato Giove e ci dirigiamo verso Nettuno.

translation.en: I know you have seen that we have excited real and enormous interest...
translation.it: Come sai, abbiamo suscitato un vero ed enorme interesse

translation.en: around the world, and we are grateful for it.
translation.it: in tutto il mondo e ne siamo grati.

translation.en: We're doing big things up here, real big.
translation.it: Facciamo cose importanti, quassù. Molto importanti.

translation.en: Namely, we're about to answer the number one question...
translation.it: Stiamo per rispondere alla domanda fondamentale:

translation.en: when do we find all the intelligent life out there?
translation.it: quando troveremo tutte le forme di vita intelligente là fuori?

translation.en: And we know we will.
We're going to the edge of the heliosphere...
where the sun's magnetic field won't affect our instruments one bit.
translation.it: dove il campo magnetico del Sole non intacca le nostre strumentazioni.

translation.en: We'll be able to examine any star system for complex life.
translation.it: Potremo cercare la vita complessa su ogni sistema stellare.

translation.en: Never been done before, and we sure are optimistic.
translation.it: Non è mai stato fatto. Di sicuro siamo ottimisti.

translation.en: I feel your energy back home, and of course, I think of God.
translation.it: Sento la vostra energia sulla Terra e, ovviamente, penso a Dio.

translation.en: I'm overwhelmed at seeing and feeling His presence...
translation.it: Sono sopraffatto dal vedere e sentire la Sua presenza

translation.en: so close.
I love you, my son.
[man] Hello, Roy.
I'm here to go on this trip with you.
translation.it: Sarò il tuo compagno di viaggio.

translation.en: Keep my eye on ya.
Colonel Pruitt, good to meet you.
Actually...
we've met.
It was a long time ago. I knew your dad.
translation.it: Tanto tempo fa. Conoscevo tuo padre.

translation.en: We were close, he and I.
We started out together, went to Purdue together.
translation.it: Abbiamo iniziato insieme, siamo andati alla Purdue insieme.

translation.en: He was a brilliant man.
-I know. -Yeah.
And I remember going to the house and seeing you.
translation.it: E ricordo quando venivo a casa vostra e ti vedevo.

translation.en: You were running around everywhere.
translation.it: Correvi a destra e a sinistra.

translation.en: You drove your poor mother nuts, but...
translation.it: Facevi impazzire la tua povera mamma, ma...

translation.en: How do you feel?
Is this part of my psych eval?
No, not really, but yes.
I mean, you're going to be monitored constantly...
your mental state, your emotional state.
translation.it: il tuo stato mentale ed emotivo.

translation.en: You have a direct connection with the subject.
translation.it: Tu hai un legame diretto col soggetto.

translation.en: Colonel, for what it's worth, I think my father's dead.
translation.it: Colonnello, per quanto possa valere, io credo che mio padre sia morto.

translation.en: Yeah, um...
I was a lunar astronaut for SPACECOM for 31 years.
translation.it: Sono stato un astronauta lunare dello SPACECOM per 31 anni.

translation.en: And I came to the realization out there...
translation.it: E là fuori sono arrivato a capire

translation.en: a voyage of exploration can be used
translation.it: che un viaggio di esplorazione può essere un modo semplice per scappare.

translation.en: for something as simple as escape.
translation.it: può essere un modo semplice per scappare.

translation.en: I'm telling you this, Roy,
because we have to hold out the possibility...
that your father may be hiding from us.
translation.it: che tuo padre si stia nascondendo da noi.

translation.en: Do you think you're ready to go?
translation.it: Credi di essere pronto a partire?

translation.en: I'm ready.
All right.
[automated voice on speakers] Your pre-launch quarantine is almost complete.
translation.it: La quarantena pre-lancio è quasi completata.

translation.en: You have shown no evidence
translation.it: Non ha mostrato segni di infezione batterica o virale...

translation.en: of bacterial or viral infection...
translation.it: Non ha mostrato segni di infezione batterica o virale... Ho rovinato tutto tante volte.

translation.en: [Roy] So many times in my life, I've screwed up.
[automated voice] Although all efforts have been made...
translation.it: Sebbene sia stato fatto ogni sforzo... Ho parlato, quando avrei dovuto ascoltare.

translation.en: [Roy] I've talked, when I should have listened.
translation.it: Ho parlato, quando avrei dovuto ascoltare.

translation.en: I've been harsh, when I should have been tender.
translation.it: Sono stato duro, quando avrei dovuto essere tenero.

translation.en: [automated voice] In the event of illness or accident...
translation.it: In caso di malattia o incidente,

translation.en: please make certain that you have listed any family members...
translation.it: si assicuri di aver indicato il familiare,

translation.en: spouse, or significant other as your next of kin, in your personal file.
translation.it: il coniuge o il partner da contattare, nel suo fascicolo personale.

translation.en: Volume down.
Message. Personal directory. Eve.
Hi, Eve, it's Roy.
I'm away again, no surprise there.
translation.it: Parto di nuovo. Sai che novità.

translation.en: I just wanted to say...
I made a promise to always be truthful.
translation.it: Avevo giurato di essere sempre sincero.

translation.en: But I wasn't.
Listen, I wanted to say...
I didn't want you to go.
translation.it: Non volevo che te ne andassi.

translation.en: Delete.
Cancel.
[automated voice on speakers] Good morning.
[Roy] I've been trained to compartmentalize.
SPACECOM requires you to complete a pre-launch psychological evaluation.
translation.it: Lo SPACECOM richiede di completare una valutazione psicologica pre-lancio.

translation.en: [Roy] It seems to me that's how I approach my life.
translation.it: È così che affronto la vita, mi sembra.

translation.en: Resting BPM is 56.
Didn't sleep much last night, but it shouldn't be a problem.
translation.it: Ieri notte ho dormito poco, ma non dovrebbe essere un problema.

translation.en: I remain mission ready.
translation.it: Sono comunque pronto per la missione.

translation.en: [automated voice] You have been approved for lunar travel.
[woman] Is it your first time to the moon?
translation.it: È il suo primo viaggio sulla Luna?

translation.en: [Roy] No, but it's been a while.
translation.it: No, ma è passato del tempo.

translation.en: [woman] Are you planning on traveling outside the secure zone on your visit?
translation.it: Una volta là, intende allontanarsi dalla zona di sicurezza?

translation.en: [Roy] No.
[woman] Again.
-How's that? -[Roy] Okay.
-[woman] Okay, not too snug? -Yeah, it feels all right.
[woman] Breathe.
[announcer on PA] Virgin flight 6092, to Tycho Base, Moon, boarding now.
translation.it: Inizio imbarco volo Virgin 6092 diretto alla base lunare Tycho.

translation.en: Welcome aboard, sir. -I'm Captain Lu. -Thank you.
translation.it: - Benvenuto. Sono il capitano Lu. - Grazie.

translation.en: -Hi, Captain. -Watch the step.
translation.it: - Salve, Capitano. - Attento al gradino e alla testa.

translation.en: -Duck your head. -Okay.
translation.it: - Salve, Capitano. - Attento al gradino e alla testa. Va bene.

translation.en: -Hello, welcome. Flight pack? -Hello.
translation.it: - Salve. Benvenuto. Kit di volo? - Salve.

translation.en: -Yes, thanks. -Great.
translation.it: - Sì, grazie. - Ottimo. Terzo sedile alla sua destra.

translation.en: -Third seat, to your right. -Okay.
translation.it: - Sì, grazie. - Ottimo. Terzo sedile alla sua destra. Va bene.

translation.en: Excuse me.
-Hello. -Hello.
[Captain Lu on PA] We remind you, the moon is borderless.
translation.it: Vi ricordiamo che, sulla Luna, non esistono frontiere.

translation.en: Many mining zones are disputed territory and considered to be in a state of war.
translation.it: Molte aree di estrazione sono contese e considerate zone di guerra.

translation.en: Please stay within the restricted, safe area...
translation.it: Restate nella zona regolamentata e sicura...

translation.en: Excuse me?
May I have a blanket and pillow pack please?
translation.it: Potrei avere una coperta e un cuscino?

translation.en: [flight attendant] Sure. $125.
[automated voice] Payment accepted.
-Thank you. -Thank you.
[Captain Lu] As we approach, some of you can see the grand telescope array...
translation.it: Mentre ci avviciniamo, alcuni noteranno il gran numero di telescopi

translation.en: near the Atlas crater.
It's the moon's largest facility for extraterrestrial research.
translation.it: È la struttura più grande sulla Luna per la ricerca extraterrestre.

translation.en: [flight attendant] Hot towel?
-Oh, thank you. -Thank you for flying with us.
translation.it: - Grazie. - Grazie a lei per averci scelti.

translation.en: We do appreciate it.
[Captain Lu] Please prepare for landing.
[Roy] All the hopes we ever had for space travel...
translation.it: Tutte le nostre aspettative sul viaggio nello spazio

translation.en: covered up by drink stands and T-shirt vendors.
translation.it: affossate da chioschi di bibite e negozi di magliette.

translation.en: Just a recreation of what we're running from on Earth.
translation.it: Solo una ricostruzione di ciò da cui scappiamo sulla Terra.

translation.en: We are world-eaters.
If my dad could see this now...
translation.it: Se mio padre fosse qui ora,

translation.en: he'd tear it all down.
[Pruitt] Our rocket is named Cepheus.
translation.it: Il nostro razzo si chiama Cepheus.

translation.en: The crew will be SPACECOM military personnel.
translation.it: A bordo ci saranno militari dello SPACECOM.

translation.en: They're completely unaware of our mission.
translation.it: Sono totalmente ignari della nostra missione.

translation.en: We have to keep it that way.
The launchpad is on the other side of no man's land.
translation.it: La rampa di lancio è dall'altra parte della terra di nessuno.

translation.en: It's very dangerous...
so we'll have armed personnel to protect us and escort us to the Far Side.
translation.it: quindi avremo una scorta armata per raggiungere la faccia nascosta.

translation.en: Colonel, can I ask what the last conversation you had with my dad was?
translation.it: Di cosa avete parlato lei e mio padre, l'ultima volta?

translation.en: It was not very pleasant.
translation.it: Non è stata una conversazione molto piacevole.

translation.en: We quarreled about my leaving the program.
translation.it: Dissentivamo sulla mia uscita dal programma.

translation.en: He accused me of being a traitor.
translation.it: Mi accusava di essere un traditore.

translation.en: And if you were to find him...
then what?
Is this very difficult for you, son?
translation.it: È molto dura per te, ragazzo?

translation.en: This being about your father?
translation.it: Il fatto che si tratti di tuo padre?

translation.en: No, my dad's a hero.
translation.it: No, mio padre è un eroe.

translation.en: SPACECOM's trying to impugn a man who's given his entire life to the program.
translation.it: Lo SPACECOM vuole screditare un uomo che ha dedicato la vita al programma.

translation.en: I think it's despicable.
Or desperate at best.
translation.it: O disperato, nel migliore dei casi.

translation.en: [announcer on PA] We are approaching Terminal R, lunar rover hangar.
translation.it: Stiamo per raggiungere il terminal R, l'hangar dei rover lunari.

translation.en: We've been having trouble with pirates since September.
translation.it: È da settembre che abbiamo problemi con i pirati.

translation.en: Some countries have been giving them safe haven.
They'll take hostages or go for our rovers.
translation.it: Loro catturano ostaggi o ci rubano i rover.

translation.en: It's like the Wild West out there...
translation.it: Sembra il selvaggio west, là fuori,

translation.en: but we'll get you to your spacecraft.

"Father, if you can hear me...

"They would like all information...
"about attempts that you are making "to ameliorate the situation.

"they're willing to help and provide "for a rescue mission if possible.

Goddamn them.

translation.en: or finally be free of him.
Dad...
Dad, I'd like to see you again.
I recall how we used to watch black and white movies together...

translation.en: and musicals were your favorite.
I remember you tutoring me in math.

translation.en: You instilled in me a strong work ethic.

translation.en: "Work hard, play later," as you said.
translation.it: "Prima il dovere, poi il piacere", dicevi.

translation.en: You should know I've chosen a career that you would approve of.

translation.en: I've dedicated my life to the exploration of space.

translation.en: And I thank you for that.
So, I hope we can reconnect.
translation.it: Quindi spero di poter comunicare di nuovo con te.

translation.en: Your loving son, Roy.
[automated voice] Transmission sent, awaiting response.

translation.en: Thank you so much, Major, for all your help.

translation.en: We'll be returning you to the Earth in short order. Thank you.

[Roy] He answered me, didn't he?
Major, we will let you know any details as soon as possible.

Your pulse is very fast.
I know!
There's also some issues with your biorhythms.

Captain.
Captain!

Can I help you?

I was born here.

It was... beautiful.

The craft you came in, the Cepheus...

translation.en: On this base.
Now, I need to know.
Are we gonna die?
I don't know what happens now.
I know who you are.
You are Clifford McBride's son.

Well, then we're both victims of the Lima Project.

The Surge is coming from the Lima Project.

SPACECOM has determined that I am unfit to carry on.

I believe your father is alive.

translation.en: I'm disclosing a tragedy.
Here, on the edge of our solar system, some of our people...

translation.it: Volevano tornare sulla Terra e io non potevo permetterlo.

translation.en: And I have to report the reality that they mutinied...
translation.it: Devo riferire che si sono ammutinati,

translation.en: and without doubt, I did punish the innocent along with the guilty.
translation.it: e, senza dubbio, ho punito sia i colpevoli che gli innocenti.

I am forever driven on this quest.
[Helen] SPACECOM would never allow their image to be shattered...

translation.en: Your father murdered my parents.

translation.en: That monster threatens us all.
And now it's your burden.

translation.en: Can you get me on that ship?
I can get you to the rocket.
After that, you're on your own.
I will deal with him.
I will deal with my father.

They're gonna come for you, you know.
I know.
I don't care anymore.

All this time.

Ten, nine...
eight, seven, six...
five, four...
We have commit.
...two, one.

Do you read?

-SPACECOM... -[personnel] Stand by.

You need me.

I will take all accountability.

-by any means necessary. -Yoshida, I am not a threat.

I'm en route to Neptune.
I remain fully committed...
to the completion of the mission...
namely to destroy the Lima Project in its entirety.

I'm going dark until final approach to avoid detection.

79 days, four hours, eight minutes.

I mean, even when you're here, I don't know where you are.

trying to connect to you, be close to you...

I'm my own person.

translation.en: And we know we will, according to the Drake Equation.

translation.en: You see it opening up just like a prairie flower in the springtime.

this is goodbye.

translation.it: ...il ritiro dal programma mi fa dubitare

[Clifford] Because we will find our brothers and sisters...

translation.en: both physically and mentally.
I am alone.
Something I always believed I preferred.
I am alone.

it's wearing on me.
I am alone. I am alone.
Over and out.
I've let so many people down.

translation.it: che io ti mandi un video invece di parlarti di persona... Sono tanto egoista. Sono tanto egoista e basta.

[Clifford] And I know for certain I am doing God's work.

translation.en: Exaltation!
[automated voice] Approaching location determined by McBride, Roy R.

-[beeps] -Entering Neptune signal zone.
[Roy] Execute 72 plus 99.

Nuclear activation code
accessible through system file 52B.

translation.en: I'm terrified even now.
What do I expect?
In the end, the son suffers the sins of the father.
translation.it: Alla fine, le colpe dei padri ricadono sui figli.

Lima, Major McBride of the Cepheus.
United States Armed Forces, Space Division.

Roy, is that you?

You alone?
Oh, yeah.
Captain always goes down with the ship.

I'm gonna stop it.
Get the two of us back home, maybe.

translation.en: Home?
Yep.
This is home.
This is a one-way voyage, my son.
translation.it: Questo è un viaggio di sola andata, figlio mio.

There was never anything for me there.
translation.it: Lì non c'è mai stato niente per me.

translation.en: I never cared about you, or your mother...

I've been breathing this air, eating this food...
translation.it: che respiro quest'aria, che mangio questo cibo,

and I never once thought about home.

but I found my destiny.

I still love you, Dad.

translation.en: I'm taking you back.
Hmm... I have work to do.
I have infinite work to do.
translation.it: Ho un'infinità di lavoro da fare.

translation.en: I must find intelligent life.
It's time to go.
We don't have much time.
Come on.
I admire your courage for coming alone, Roy...
translation.it: Ammiro il tuo coraggio, Roy. Sei venuto da solo,

translation.en: traveling all this way...
following me here.
translation.it: mi hai seguito fino a qui.

translation.en: Makes me wonder what we could have accomplished together.
translation.it: Mi domando cosa avremmo potuto realizzare insieme.

translation.en: But I guess...
the fates have deprived me of the partner I should have had.
translation.it: che il destino mi abbia privato del compagno che avrei dovuto avere.

translation.en: If we'd had more people like you...
we could have pressed on, could've found what we're looking for.
translation.it: ci saremmo forse spinti oltre trovando ciò che stiamo cercando.

translation.en: My crew examined all the data...
translation.it: Il mio equipaggio ha analizzato ogni dato

translation.en: discovered no other life out there.
translation.it: e non ha scoperto altre forme di vita là fuori.

translation.en: No other consciousness.
They quit.
Sometimes...
the human will must overcome the impossible.
translation.it: la volontà umana deve superare l'impossibile.

translation.en: You and I have to continue on, Roy. Together.
translation.it: Tu e io dobbiamo continuare, Roy. Insieme.

translation.en: To find what science claims does not exist.
translation.it: Per trovare ciò la cui esistenza è negata dalla scienza.

translation.en: You and I, together, Roy.
Because the Lima Project has told us...
translation.it: Perché il Progetto Lima ci ha detto

translation.en: that we're all alone in the knowable universe.
I can't fail.
You can't let me fail, Roy.
Dad...
you haven't.
Now, we know...
we're all we've got.
[automated voice] Armed. T-minus three hours.
[grunting] Dad! Stop!
Let me go.
Let me go, Roy.
Roy, let me go.
Let me go, Roy.
Dad!
Let me go, Roy.
Unhook me.
Unhook me, son.
[Roy] Why go on?
Why keep trying?
[Clifford] You're gathering my work, I see.
translation.it: Stai raccogliendo il mio lavoro, vedo.

translation.en: [automated voice] Data download initiated.
We're a dying breed, Roy.
translation.it: Siamo una specie in estinzione, Roy.

translation.en: [Roy] He captured strange and distant worlds in greater detail than ever before.
translation.it: Ha fotografato mondi strani e distanti più in dettaglio di chiunque altro prima.

translation.en: They were beautiful, magnificent...
full of awe and wonder.
But beneath their sublime surfaces...
translation.it: Ma, sotto la loro superficie sublime,

translation.en: there was nothing.
No love or hate.
No light or dark.
He could only see what was not there...
translation.it: Ha solo saputo vedere ciò che non c'era

translation.en: and missed what was right in front of him.
translation.it: e non ha visto cosa aveva davanti.

translation.en: Command, this is Major Roy McBride.
translation.it: Comando, qui è il maggiore Roy McBride.

translation.en: I made it to the Lima Project.
translation.it: Sono riuscito a raggiungere il Progetto Lima.

translation.en: I am destroying the structure...
to prevent any further surges from reaching Earth...
translation.it: per impedire che altri picchi raggiungano la Terra,

translation.en: using the nuclear munitions onboard.
translation.it: usando le armi nucleari a bordo.

translation.en: I will attempt to return using the explosion as my primary propellant.
translation.it: Tenterò di fare ritorno sfruttando la spinta dell'esplosione.

translation.en: In the case I do not survive, I've retrieved significant data from the Lima.
translation.it: Se non sopravvivessi, ho recuperato dati importanti dal Lima.

translation.en: And all efforts should be made to retrieve my craft.
translation.it: Dunque cercate in tutti i modi di recuperare la mia navicella.

translation.en: [automated voice] Trajectory, Earth. 2.714 billion miles.
I am looking forward to the day my solitude ends.
translation.it: Aspetto con ansia il giorno in cui finirà la mia solitudine.

translation.en: And I'm home.
[automated voice] Detonation in T-minus 20 seconds.
[man 1] The aboard advisory system.
[man 2] Affirmative, we're ready.
[man 1] USP flight system is operational. Thank you.
translation.it: Sistema di volo USP operativo. Grazie.

translation.en: [man 2] K-R-5 on the 4-2.
[man 1] Good copy, flight.
We're ready to go.
[man] Coming in, clean.
Copy that. Thanks.
One ready to go. Data is good.
translation.it: Uno pronto a partire. Dati buoni.

translation.en: We have all good. All good.
You're all right, Major.
[Roy] I'm steady, calm.
I slept well. No bad dreams.
translation.it: Ho dormito bene. Nessun brutto sogno.

translation.en: I am active and engaged.
I'm aware of my surroundings and those in my immediate sphere.
translation.it: Sono ben consapevole di ciò che mi circonda e di chi mi è più vicino.

translation.en: I'm attentive.
I'm focused on the essential...
to the exclusion of all else.
I'm unsure of the future...
but I'm not concerned.
I will rely on those closest to me.
translation.it: Farò affidamento su coloro che mi sono più cari.

translation.en: And I will share their burdens...
translation.it: E mi farò carico dei loro fardelli.

translation.en: as they share mine.
I will live...
and love.
Submit.
